string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
You must meet with one of the Monolith elders. Go to him now.
Good luck.
Destroy the Non-Believers
Lead the Monolith attack against the infidels.
The time has come, my son. You must lead your brothers into battle. Fight fiecely and accept no surrender. Defeat the infidels for the good of the Monolith.
Excellent work. You are a fine warrior.
Collect %s for Monolith
Rabbit has asked me to bring him %s.
My son, your brothers need for you to collect provisions.
Bring us %s.
You have done well.
Venture into the Zone
You must prove your worth by surviving a journey into the Zone.

My son, you must prove yourself to the almighty Monolith. You must travel alone deep into the Zone. Face all challenges that confront you. Destroy all enemies you encounter. Do this for the good of the Monolith.
You have done well, my son.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
My son, you serve the Monolith well. Speak with one of the elders and ask what you may do to further help our great cause.
Good luck.
Recover Stolen Monolith Equipment
A stalker has sabotaged the Brain Scorcher. Recover the equipment he removed
A stalker has stolen a vital piece of equipment from the Brain Scorcher. You must recover it for the good of the almighty Monolith.
You have done well.
Hunt for Food
Lead a hunt into the Zone to harvest meat for your Monolith brothers.
My son, we must replenish our food stores. Will you lead a hunt so your brothers may feast?
You have all served the Monolith well. The meat you have brought will be served at tonights feast. As your reward, we will reserve the eyeballs for you.
Monolith %s Arsenal
Cleric wants %s to expand the mighty Monolith arsenal.
My son, we must build up our mighty arsenal so we may achieve our glorious goals.
You must bring me %s. Your success will greatly serve the Monolith cause.
You have done well, my son.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
You must meet with one of the Monolith leaders. Go to him now.
Good luck.
Eliminate the Intruders
Olivar informed you about a group of intruders. They must be eliminated at any cost.
A group of intruders have been spotted in the area. We can't let them survive. Eliminate them.
Well done. You proved yourself.
Investigate the Scouts' Location
Olivar tasked you to find the missing scouts
Olivar tasked you to find the missing scouts, but $item_1 is required to search.
Olivar tasked you to find the missing scouts.\nHead over to $map.
Olivar tasked you to find the missing scouts.\nUse the $item_1 and set up the frequency to $freq MHz. Search for a good signal around.
You must retrieve the $item_2 you found and show it to Olivar.
Go back to Olivar with your findings.

I have an important mission for you, brother. We have sent a squad of our scouts to observe unusual activities in the area. A day has passed and they are nowhere to be found. Their failure has brought shame on us all! It is up to us to see if they can still be redeemed. Here, this is the PDA signal frequency for one of the scouts. Trace it and discover what happened to them.
This information will be useful. Thank you, brother.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
There is a contact who is willing to pay well for our services. Go see him.
Good luck.
Hunt Down the Dangerous Mutant
Griffith and his mercs are getting tired from the nightly raids of a persistent mutant. I've agreed to track it down and kill it.
This fucking monster comes back every night to attack our guards. We can't let it slip out any longer. Find it, kill it.
Finally! we can rest in peace. Here's your reward.
Search Lab X-8
Griffith won't get back to Dushman empty handed. Search Lab X-8 for any documents you can find.

We came here to retrieve info from Lab X8, which is located near the Yubileiny service center north of here. We'd have something useful to leave with, at least. I'd head over there again with the guys, but there aren't many of us left and it'd be too much to handle, since we'd rather not spend any more manpower than we need to trying to somehow get away from the center of the fucking Zone. Head down to X8 - there could be something left
Very interesting... these documents could be very valuable to the right people. You did a great job.
Relinquish Payment to Join Monolith
When I become Monolith, I will have little need for money. Rabbit only asks for a paltry 1,000 RU to let me join the almighty Monolith.
It's good you have come to your senses, my child. We will welcome you into the order of the Monolith but you must first relinquish a token of your worldly possessions in the form of 1,000 RU.
Good. Welcome to the brotherhood of the Monolith.
Purge the Infidels
Eidolon wants to collect some %s.

We are besieged. Infidels wish to exploit the almighty Monolith. Driven by avarice. Ignorance. Base desires. On behalf of the Monolith. We act, the guardians. Purge the infidels. Collect their badges. As a trophy. A sign of our unquestionable, superiority. Go, brother. Destroy them all.

We are besieged. Infidels wish to exploit the almighty Monolith. Driven by avarice. Ignorance. Base desires. On behalf of the Monolith. We act, the guardians. Purge the infidels. Collect their badges. As a trophy. A sign of our unquestionable, superiority. Go, brother. Destroy them all. Acquire %s on your mission.
Such devotion. To our glorious cause. Devotion shall be rewarded.
The Greatest Warrior
Collect %s trophies for Eidolon.

Dangerous. Lethal beasts. A gift of the Zone, for us to behold. For us to take. Guardians, providers, as well as a milestone. A way to test our strength. Resolve, and combat prowess. Go, brother. Hunt a mighty hunter, man versus beast.

Dangerous. Lethal beasts. A gift of the Zone, for us to behold. For us to take. Guardians, providers, as well as a milestone. A way to test our strength. Resolve, and combat prowess. Go, brother. Hunt a mighty hunter, man versus beast. Collect %s to prove your worth.
Magnificent trophy. The Monolith is proud. So am I. A reward, for you.
Harvest the Fruit
Eidolon wants to collect a "%s" artefact.

We protect the Monolith. The Monolith protects us. We serve, and the Zone delivers. Splendid fruit, resplendent with its unequalled brilliance. Powerful, to empower us. Go now, harvest the fruit, brother.

We protect the Monolith. The Monolith protects us. We serve, and the Zone delivers. Splendid fruit, resplendent with its unequalled brilliance. Powerful, to empower us. Go now, harvest the fruit, brother. Harvest a "%s" artefact, to bolster our strength.
Excellent. Marvellous. A sight to behold. You have got my gratitude, loyal brother.
Keeper of Secrets
Recover documents which contain secrets of the Zone and bring them back to Eidolon.
There exist, documents. Which speak of the wonders of the Zone. In detail. Secret knowledge. Infidels must not know. Recover the documents. Bring them to me, and I shall reward you.
The Zone is safe. Owing to you.
Conquer the Enemy
You have been tasked to clear an area for the good of the almighty Monolith. Report back to Rabbit after the job is done.
I have an important mission for you. You must journey into the Zone and clear the area so that our forces may move in. Are you ready?
The task is done? Good. Praise Monolith.
Kill the Planner
A stalker is trying to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. Kill him.
There are many threats to the great works of the Zone. There is one who is once again planning to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. He must be stopped. You must find him and destroy him.
You have done well. The Collective is pleased.
Procure a %s for Rabbit
Rabbit has requested a new rifle to add to the Monolith arsenal.
We grow more powerful every day. We need more weaponry to continue to achieve our goals. You must find a new weapon for us so we may continue to grow our arsenal.
Find a new %s and bring it to me.
This will do well.
Hunt for %s for Rabbit
Hunt for and field dress %s. Return the meat to Rabbit so he may prepare it.
Our provisions run low. You must go out into the Zone and hunt for meat so that your Monolith brothers may feast.
Hunt for and bring us %s. Remember these creatures are a gift of the Zone. Kill them swiftly and give thanks. Return the meat to me when you have succeeded.
You have succeeded in your task. Well done.
Collect %s for Rabbit
Procure %s and return them to Rabbit.
You must procure more supplies for us so we may continue our great works.
Retrieve %s and bring them to me.
You have done well to serve Monolith.
Find the "%s" Artefact for Rabbit
Find the "%s" artefact. Bring it back to Rabbit so he may prepare it as an offering.
We must find another artefact to give as an offering. Will you help serve the good of the Monolith?
Find a "%s" artefact. Bring it to me when you have succeeded so we may conduct the ceremony.
You serve the Monolith well. Join us tonight in the ceremonial offering. There will be chanting.
Find %s for Cleric
%s are required by Cleric to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need you to do something for me. I need specific tools to tune our weapons.
Okay, I need a %s. Go, now.
You've done well.
Find %s for Cleric
%s are required by Cleric to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Good. You've brought them to me.
Find %s for Cleric
%s are required by Cleric to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Good. You've brought them to me.
Destroy the enemy
Charon has asked me to liberate a key position in the Zone.
My brother, your help is needed in the destruction of the infidels.
Blessings of the Monolith upon you, brother! Take what you deserve.
Collect %s
Charon asked me to bring %s.
The great Monolith will offer rewards to any brothers helping to purify our holy land from the infidels. Show me the insignias of these worms as proof of your actions.
The great Monolith will offer rewards to any brothers helping to purify our holy land from the infidels. Bring me %s as proof of your actions.
Outstanding, brother. This is for you, from the Monolith.
Collect %s
Griffin has asked me to collect %s.

There are just too many fanatics prowling about for us to work effectively. I'd like you to bloody their nose, make them back off a bit, and tear off their patches as proof. I've got a fat wad of cash hidden about here somewhere. It's yours if you bring me %s.

There are just too many fanatics prowling about for us to work effectively. I'd like you to bloody their nose, make them back off a bit, and tear off their patches as proof. I've got a fat wad of cash hidden about here somewhere. It's yours if you bring me %s.
Thanks, stalker. Here's the dough I promised you.
Find a Soul artefact
Griffin has asked me to locate and return a Soul artefact.

There's no doctor here, and we've got to survive somehow. Ordinary medical equipment just isn't enough for us, and not many of the men know how to use it properly. It's hard enough taking care of everyone around here. So, I want to ask for your help. I've heard about an artefact called the Soul, said to have an ability to heal the wounds of people. Could you find one and bring it here for us?
You actually found one? I can't believe it... Thank you, stalker! This will help the others. And don't go without your reward.
Clean out the grocery store
The mercenaries want the dogs at the nearest grocery store taken care of.

Hey there. We've got another problem - there are dogs who have settled down at the grocery store, and that's no good for us. They've been barking at us nonstop, and that draws unwanted attention. I'd appreciate it if you could clear them out from that place.
Thank you, great work. Here's some money for your trouble.
Find %s for the Mercenary mechanic in Outskirts
A mercenary technician in the Outskirts has asked me to find %s.

We've been sitting on our asses here in Pripyat for such a long time... Surely, you've heard our story from Griffin. I've searched high and low for tools, but I've only managed to find low tier ones that aren't suitable for extensive maintenance and customization. This is outrageous. I'm a technician, and I need proper tools to work optimally. Can you help me out?

We've been sitting on our asses here in Pripyat for such a long time... Surely, you've heard our story from Griffin. I've searched high and low for tools, but I've only managed to find low tier ones that aren't suitable for extensive maintenance and customization. This is outrageous. I'm a technician, and I need proper tools to work optimally. Can you help me out?
Thank you - won't be as stressful for the guys here anymore. I'll give you a discount.
Find %s for the Mercenary mechanic in Outskirts
A mercenary technician in the Outskirts has asked me to find %s.
Well, we've sorted out a few issues, but there's still a lot left to do. Need better tools for even more upgrades. Mind helping out again?
Well, we've sorted out a few issues, but there's still a lot left to do. Need better tools for even more upgrades. Mind helping out again?
Well done. Now I have a full set, and you can have all the discounts you're entitled to.
Find %s for the Monolith technician
The technician in the Yubileiny service center has asked me to bring him %s.
I need your help, brother. I require tools for our equipment so that our brethren may spread the word of the Monolith more effectively.
I need your help, brother. I require tools for our equipment so that our brethren may spread the word of the Monolith more effectively.
Excellent work, brother. Everything we gain from future improvements will go to our charity, and your contribution will grant you a small discount.
Find %s for the Monolith technician
The technician in the Yubileiny service center has asked me to bring him %s.
The set of tools you located previously does not suffice. Finer tools are required for more extensive work so that our brethren may continue spreading Its will. Will you serve our cause once again?
The set of tools you located previously does not suffice. Finer tools are required for more extensive work so that our brethren may continue spreading Its will. Will you serve our cause once again?
Excellent work, brother. Everything we gain from future improvements will go to our charity, and your contribution will grant you an additional discount.
Find %s for the Monolith technician
The technician in the Yubileiny service center asked me to bring him %s.

The last set of tools that you brought here was... adequate, but why stop at what has been achieved when we can attain something even better? What we need are the best tools in the Zone. I ask of you to serve Its will one last time, my brother.

The last set of tools that you brought here was... adequate, but why stop at what has been achieved when we can attain something even better? What we need are the best tools in the Zone. I ask of you to serve Its will one last time, my brother.
Outstanding work, brother. Rest assured, I will mention your contribution to our brothers... and I promise to provide any assistance within my ability.
